But for the sake 	of India’s 	freedom, there had 	come about an 	alliance between the 	radical Gandhi and 	the nationalist forces; 	and the 	prediction was 	made that as 	Gandhi became more and 	more radical in 	action, the 	nationalist forces would 	tend to drop 	away from his company.
